com.mapgroup.classificator.boundary

Class MultiServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • com.mapgroup.classificator.boundary.MultiServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRemoteServer, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class MultiServer
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements IRemoteServer
    This class represents all the main server capabilities.  The server grant the possibility to the user to learn Decision tree from a specified dataset.

    The server, using the multi-threading Java libraries, is able to manage multiple clients in the same moment and grants to them to ask for the services that has at its disposal.

    Other important functionality that the server grant to the user are:

    • Report of the predicition session in pdf format
    • Upload of specific dataset in different format (txt,arff,xls)
    • Mail sending to multiple addressees with attachments
    • Dataset creation and manipulation from the supported dataset format

    See Also:

      • displayOperationResult

        Parameters:
        response - the structure which contains the results

      • generateContextRequest

        private ContextRequest generateContextRequest(ClientRequest clientRequest)
        Generates a specific structure according to the client's request which contains all the information for the current context in which the request is done.

        The context structure contains all the information about the context which is determined from the specific service that the client needs from the server. For each task, specific context information are needed in order to complete the task. All this kind of information are saved in the generated context structure.

        Parameters:
        clientRequest - the client's request
        Returns:
        current context information

      • initAndShowGUI

        private void initAndShowGUI()
        Initializes and creates the graphical interface for the main panel of the server on which will be displayed all the operation that the clients will do.

      • satisfyRequest

        public ServerResponse satisfyRequest(ClientRequest clientRequest)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Remote method used in order to satisfy the specified request made by the current client. It returns a specific response which contains all the information resulting from the server's computation.
        Specified by:
        satisfyRequest in interface IRemoteServer
        Parameters:
        clientRequest - the client's request
        Returns:
        structure which contains the result of the current operation
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - if some errors occurred while processing the specified client's request
